## SearchBoxProps interface

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface SearchBoxProps 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [defaultValue?](./components.searchboxprops.defaultvalue.md) |  | string | <i>(Optional)</i> Value to display in the box on initial display. |
|  [errorMessage?](./components.searchboxprops.errormessage.md) |  | string | <i>(Optional)</i> Error message to display below the text field when applicable. |
|  [label?](./components.searchboxprops.label.md) |  | string | <i>(Optional)</i> Label above the search box. |
|  [onSearch?](./components.searchboxprops.onsearch.md) |  | (query: string) =&gt; any | <i>(Optional)</i> Callback to receive query text when the user presses enter or clicks the search button. |
|  [placeholder?](./components.searchboxprops.placeholder.md) |  | string | <i>(Optional)</i> Placeholder text for the empty text field. |
